abigail-morris-museum.name: Abigail Morris
abigail-morris-museum.bio: Director of the Jewish Museum London, overseeing exhibitions and educational outreach programs.

maurice-cohen-ireland.name: Maurice Cohen
maurice-cohen-ireland.bio: Active leader in the Irish Jewish community working to preserve heritage and strengthen community bonds.

dominique-mandonnaud.name: Dominique Mandonnaud
dominique-mandonnaud.bio: Created the open-sell concept in beauty retail.

niklas-stberg.name: Niklas Östberg
niklas-stberg.bio: Swedish entrepreneur who co-founded Delivery Hero.

luciano-benetton.name: Luciano Benetton
luciano-benetton.bio: Italian billionaire businessman who co-founded the Benetton Group.

leonardo-del-vecchio.name: Leonardo Del Vecchio
leonardo-del-vecchio.bio: Italian billionaire who built Luxottica from a small workshop into a global eyewear giant.

amancio-ortega.name: Amancio Ortega
amancio-ortega.bio: Spanish billionaire who founded Inditex and Zara, one of the wealthiest people in the world.

marc-rich.name: Marc Rich
marc-rich.bio: Belgian-born American-Israeli commodities trader who founded Glencore (originally Marc Rich + Co AG).

barbara-spectre.name: Barbara Spectre
barbara-spectre.bio: American-born Israeli academic who founded and directs Paideia.

roberto-marinho.name: Roberto Marinho
roberto-marinho.bio: Brazilian media mogul who built Rede Globo into a global media empire.

marcos-galperin.name: Marcos Galperin
marcos-galperin.bio: Argentine billionaire entrepreneur who founded Mercado Libre.

carlos-slim.name: Carlos Slim
carlos-slim.bio: Mexican business magnate, one of the richest people in the world, of Lebanese Christian descent but with close Jewish community ties.

gavriel-holtzberg.name: Gavriel Holtzberg
gavriel-holtzberg.bio: Chabad rabbi who directed the Mumbai Chabad House until his murder in the 2008 terrorist attacks.

mukesh-ambani.name: Mukesh Ambani
mukesh-ambani.bio: Indian billionaire businessman, chairman of Reliance Industries, one of the richest people in the world.

ratan-tata.name: Ratan Tata
ratan-tata.bio: Indian industrialist who led the Tata Group through major global expansion.

n-r-narayana-murthy.name: N. R. Narayana Murthy
n-r-narayana-murthy.bio: Indian billionaire IT industrialist often called the 'Father of the Indian IT industry'.

masayoshi-son.name: Masayoshi Son
masayoshi-son.bio: Japanese-Korean billionaire who founded SoftBank. One of the world's most prolific tech investors.

akio-morita.name: Akio Morita
akio-morita.bio: Japanese businessman who co-founded Sony and was instrumental in making it a global brand.

akio-toyoda.name: Akio Toyoda
akio-toyoda.bio: Great-grandson of founder Sakichi Toyoda, led Toyota as president and now serves as chairman.

jacob-elias-sassoon.name: Jacob Elias Sassoon
jacob-elias-sassoon.bio: Baghdadi Jewish businessman who built the Ohel Rachel Synagogue in memory of his wife.

ma-huateng-pony-ma.name: Ma Huateng (Pony Ma)
ma-huateng-pony-ma.bio: Chinese billionaire entrepreneur who co-founded Tencent.

jack-ma.name: Jack Ma
jack-ma.bio: Chinese billionaire entrepreneur who founded Alibaba Group.

lee-jae-yong.name: Lee Jae-yong
lee-jae-yong.bio: Chairman of Samsung Electronics, grandson of Samsung founder Lee Byung-chul.

chung-eui-sun.name: Chung Eui-sun
chung-eui-sun.bio: Chairman of Hyundai Motor Group, overseeing the company's push into electric and autonomous vehicles.

mike-cannon-brookes.name: Mike Cannon-Brookes
mike-cannon-brookes.bio: Australian tech billionaire who co-founded Atlassian.

menachem-mendel-schneerson.name: Menachem Mendel Schneerson
menachem-mendel-schneerson.bio: Seventh Rebbe of Chabad-Lubavitch, one of the most influential Jewish leaders of the 20th century who built Chabad into a global movement.

robert-h-steers.name: Robert H. Steers
robert-h-steers.bio: Co-founded Cohen & Steers, a pioneer in listed real estate investing.

kevin-plank.name: Kevin Plank
kevin-plank.bio: American billionaire entrepreneur who founded Under Armour.

tobias-l-tke.name: Tobias Lütke
tobias-l-tke.bio: German-Canadian billionaire entrepreneur who co-founded Shopify.

nikolay-storonsky.name: Nikolay Storonsky
nikolay-storonsky.bio: Russian-British billionaire entrepreneur who co-founded Revolut.

demis-hassabis.name: Demis Hassabis
demis-hassabis.bio: British AI researcher and Nobel laureate who co-founded DeepMind.

jamie-dimon.name: Jamie Dimon
jamie-dimon.bio: American billionaire businessman of Greek descent. Chairman and CEO of JPMorgan Chase.

jensen-huang.name: Jensen Huang
jensen-huang.bio: Taiwanese-American billionaire and co-founder of Nvidia.

stewart-butterfield.name: Stewart Butterfield
stewart-butterfield.bio: Canadian-American tech entrepreneur who co-founded both Flickr and Slack.

elon-musk.name: Elon Musk
elon-musk.bio: South African-born American billionaire, founder of SpaceX, CEO of Tesla, and one of the wealthiest people in history.

joe-tsai.name: Joe Tsai
joe-tsai.bio: Taiwanese-Canadian billionaire, co-founder of Alibaba, owner of the Brooklyn Nets.

gary-hirshberg.name: Gary Hirshberg
gary-hirshberg.bio: American businessman dubbed the 'CE-Yo' who grew Stonyfield into a major organic brand.

vilna-gaon.name: Vilna Gaon
vilna-gaon.bio: Rabbi Elijah ben Solomon Zalman, one of the most influential Jewish scholars of modern times.

hannah-greenbaum-solomon.name: Hannah Greenbaum Solomon
hannah-greenbaum-solomon.bio: Social activist who founded the National Council of Jewish Women at the 1893 World's Fair.

hock-tan.name: Hock Tan
hock-tan.bio: Malaysian-American businessman and CEO of Broadcom.

daniel-edelman.name: Daniel Edelman
daniel-edelman.bio: American public relations pioneer who founded what became the world's largest PR firm.

vincent-bollor.name: Vincent Bolloré
vincent-bollor.bio: French billionaire businessman controlling the Bolloré Group.

bernard-arnault.name: Bernard Arnault
bernard-arnault.bio: French billionaire, chairman and CEO of LVMH, at various times the world's wealthiest person.

fran-ois-henri-pinault.name: François-Henri Pinault
fran-ois-henri-pinault.bio: French billionaire businessman controlling Kering and Artémis.

zalman-bernstein.name: Zalman Bernstein
zalman-bernstein.bio: American financier and philanthropist who founded Sanford C. Bernstein & Co.

samuel-irving-newhouse-sr.name: Samuel Irving Newhouse Sr.
samuel-irving-newhouse-sr.bio: American media entrepreneur who built a publishing empire. Son of Jewish immigrants from Russia and Austria.

abraham-ikuro-teshima.name: Abraham Ikuro Teshima
abraham-ikuro-teshima.bio: Japanese Christian leader who founded the Makuya movement and fostered deep ties with Israel.

emanuel-ringelblum.name: Emanuel Ringelblum
emanuel-ringelblum.bio: Polish-Jewish historian who organized the secret Oyneg Shabes archive in the Warsaw Ghetto.

moses-sofer.name: Moses Sofer
moses-sofer.bio: Leading Orthodox rabbi known as the Chatam Sofer, head of the Pressburg Yeshiva, one of the most influential rabbis of the modern era.

steve-wynn.name: Steve Wynn
steve-wynn.bio: American real estate businessman and art collector who revitalized the Las Vegas Strip.

albert-einstein-physicist.name: Albert Einstein
albert-einstein-physicist.bio: German-born theoretical physicist (1879-1955). Nobel Prize in Physics 1921. Developed the theory of relativity. Offered presidency of Israel in 1952 (declined).

franz-kafka.name: Franz Kafka
franz-kafka.bio: German-speaking Bohemian novelist (1883-1924). One of the major figures of 20th-century literature. Born into a middle-class Ashkenazi Jewish family in Prague.

hannah-arendt.name: Hannah Arendt
hannah-arendt.bio: German-American political theorist (1906-1975). Wrote 'The Origins of Totalitarianism' and coined 'the banality of evil' while covering the Eichmann trial.

emma-lazarus.name: Emma Lazarus
emma-lazarus.bio: American poet (1849-1887). Wrote 'The New Colossus' sonnet ('Give me your tired, your poor') on the Statue of Liberty. Of Sephardic Jewish descent.

golda-meir.name: Golda Meir
golda-meir.bio: Israeli stateswoman and politician (1898-1978). Fourth Prime Minister of Israel. One of the first female heads of state in the world.

david-ben-gurion.name: David Ben-Gurion
david-ben-gurion.bio: Primary national founder of the State of Israel (1886-1973). First Prime Minister. Proclaimed the establishment of Israel on May 14, 1948.

menachem-begin.name: Menachem Begin
menachem-begin.bio: Israeli politician and statesman (1913-1992). Sixth Prime Minister of Israel. Signed the Camp David Accords. Nobel Peace Prize 1978.

yitzhak-rabin.name: Yitzhak Rabin
yitzhak-rabin.bio: Israeli politician, statesman, and general (1922-1995). Fifth Prime Minister. Signed the Oslo Accords. Nobel Peace Prize 1994. Assassinated by a Jewish extremist.

shimon-peres.name: Shimon Peres
shimon-peres.bio: Israeli politician and statesman (1923-2016). Ninth President of Israel. Nobel Peace Prize 1994. Served in nearly every major governmental role.

ruth-bader-ginsburg.name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
ruth-bader-ginsburg.bio: American jurist (1933-2020). Second female Justice of the US Supreme Court (1993-2020). Pioneered gender equality litigation. Cultural icon known as 'Notorious RBG.'

henry-kissinger.name: Henry Kissinger
henry-kissinger.bio: German-born American politician, diplomat, and geopolitical consultant (1923-2023). Secretary of State under Nixon and Ford. Nobel Peace Prize 1973.

sandy-koufax.name: Sandy Koufax
sandy-koufax.bio: American baseball pitcher (1935-). Hall of Famer. One of the greatest pitchers in history. Famous for refusing to pitch Game 1 of the 1965 World Series on Yom Kippur.

bob-dylan.name: Bob Dylan
bob-dylan.bio: American singer-songwriter (1941-). Born Robert Allen Zimmerman. Nobel Prize in Literature 2016. One of the most influential musicians of the 20th century.

leonard-cohen.name: Leonard Cohen
leonard-cohen.bio: Canadian singer-songwriter, poet, and novelist (1934-2016). Born into an influential Montreal Jewish family. Known for 'Hallelujah' and deeply spiritual works.

barbra-streisand.name: Barbra Streisand
barbra-streisand.bio: American singer, actress, and filmmaker (1942-). One of the best-selling recording artists of all time with over 150 million records sold. EGOT winner.

itzhak-perlman.name: Itzhak Perlman
itzhak-perlman.bio: Israeli-American violinist (1945-). Regarded as one of the greatest violinists of the modern era. Overcame polio. 16-time Grammy Award winner.

daniel-barenboim.name: Daniel Barenboim
daniel-barenboim.bio: Argentine-Israeli pianist and conductor (1942-). Founded the West-Eastern Divan Orchestra with Edward Said to promote Israeli-Palestinian dialogue.

saul-bellow.name: Saul Bellow
saul-bellow.bio: Canadian-American writer (1915-2005). Nobel Prize in Literature 1976. Known for 'The Adventures of Augie March,' 'Herzog,' and 'Humboldt's Gift.'

philip-roth.name: Philip Roth
philip-roth.bio: American novelist (1933-2018). Author of 'Portnoy's Complaint,' 'American Survey,' and many others. Won the Pulitzer Prize and nearly every major literary award.

woody-allen.name: Woody Allen
woody-allen.bio: American filmmaker, writer, and comedian (1935-). Known for 'Annie Hall,' 'Manhattan,' and prolific filmography of over 50 films. Four-time Academy Award winner.

mel-brooks.name: Mel Brooks
mel-brooks.bio: American filmmaker, comedian, and songwriter (1926-). EGOT winner. Known for 'The Producers,' 'Blazing Saddles,' 'Young Frankenstein.' Served in WWII.

irving-berlin.name: Irving Berlin
irving-berlin.bio: Belarusian-born American composer (1888-1989). Wrote 'God Bless America,' 'White Christmas,' and nearly 1,500 songs. Born Israel Isidore Baline to a Jewish family.

george-gershwin.name: George Gershwin
george-gershwin.bio: American composer and pianist (1898-1937). Composed 'Rhapsody in Blue,' 'An American in Paris,' and 'Porgy and Bess.' Born to a Russian Jewish immigrant family in Brooklyn.

leonard-bernstein.name: Leonard Bernstein
leonard-bernstein.bio: American conductor, composer, and pianist (1918-1990). Composed 'West Side Story.' First American conductor to lead a major symphony orchestra.

jonas-salk.name: Jonas Salk
jonas-salk.bio: American virologist (1914-1995). Developed the first successful polio vaccine. Born to Russian-Jewish immigrant parents. Refused to patent the vaccine.

hedy-lamarr.name: Hedy Lamarr
hedy-lamarr.bio: Austrian-American actress and inventor (1914-2000). Born Hedwig Eva Maria Kiesler to a Jewish family in Vienna. Co-invented frequency-hopping technology used in WiFi and Bluetooth.

marc-chagall.name: Marc Chagall
marc-chagall.bio: Russian-French artist (1887-1985). Born Moishe Shagal to a Hasidic Jewish family in Vitebsk. One of the most successful artists of the 20th century.

amedeo-modigliani.name: Amedeo Modigliani
amedeo-modigliani.bio: Italian painter and sculptor (1884-1920). Born to a Sephardic Jewish family in Livorno. Known for portraiture and nudes with elongated forms.

primo-levi.name: Primo Levi
primo-levi.bio: Italian Jewish chemist, partisan, and author (1919-1987). Holocaust survivor whose memoir 'If This Is a Man' is considered one of the most important works of the 20th century.

dario-amodei.name: Dario Amodei
dario-amodei.bio: American AI researcher and co-founder of Anthropic.

brian-armstrong.name: Brian Armstrong
brian-armstrong.bio: American billionaire entrepreneur and CEO of Coinbase.

vlad-tenev.name: Vlad Tenev
vlad-tenev.bio: Bulgarian-American billionaire entrepreneur who co-founded Robinhood.

morris-chang.name: Morris Chang
morris-chang.bio: Chinese-American Taiwanese businessman who founded TSMC and is called the 'Father of semiconductor manufacturing.'
